hero.desc: Create questions and exams quickly with smart solutions. Academix leverages technology to elevate your learning.

student.title: Students
student.desc: A platform for sharing exam papers and study materials. By creating their own quizzes, students can self-study with suitable materials while sharing them with their study groups.

teacher.title: Teachers
teacher.desc: Simple, accurate paper creation with effective assessment methods, helping instructors easily manage lectures and teaching quality.

center.title: Training centers
center.desc: Detailed technical support that helps organizations quickly organize and schedule training content for staff.
